text:
We have Tomcat 6.0.20 running with IIS - we use a lot of session variables.  From time to time we receive "java.lang.IllegalStateException: setAttribute: Session already invalidated". This happens when the user is still actively working in the application. So it seems like the session is expiring sooner than the 30 minute time out set in the web.xml.  
It happens randomly throughout the application. We have not been able to isolate it to any definite pattern, page or user browser type.  
Thanks
